name: Supra Mayro Werlt
description:
One year after the events of Supra Mayro Kratt, Mayro and Luggy go on an epic journey to defeat an evil enemy. 

Features:

- Luggy Mode

- New desert rumble level

- New mechanics

- Endboss fight

- Main menu

Controls:

AD = Left & Right

Space = Jump

Left Mouse Click = Shoot Fireballs

CTRL = Restart level

ESC = Main Menu
